content:
When you enable Article Personalization for Knowledge, capabilities and benefits of Dynamic Forms are made available to your Knowledge record pages.

Review considerations and limitations related to Dynamic Forms before enabling Article Personalization.

After upgrading to Dynamic Forms, the only way to go back to the previous page layout for Knowledge is to drag a new record detail component onto the record page in the Lightning App Builder.

The File field is not supported on Dynamic Forms.

If you use Dynamic Forms to set a filter on the Is Primary Language field and a knowledge article uses that primary language, the filter always returns a value of FALSE if the org is not set up for multi-language support.

A known issue prevents setting certain fields as read-only when using Dynamic Forms: 
Language (writable only when creating a new knowledge article) 
Visible in Public Knowledge Base 
Visible in Partner Portal 
Visible in Customer Portal

Page Layout field properties are not maintained when upgrading the record page to Dynamic Forms. You must redefine field properties again in the Lightning App Builder after upgrading.

Considerations and Limitations for the Lightning Editor, Lightning Article Editor, Article Personalization for Knowledge, Configure Knowledge Record Pages with Dynamic Forms.
title: Service Cloud Knowledge Personalization Considerations
